event.title: was established as a town in 1874

data.event: Old Chico or Chico City was established as a town in 1874 but had grown into a permanently populated community much earlier, making it one of Montana's oldest surviving settlements.

event.title: was discovered in the Chico area in 1863

data.event: Gold was discovered in the Chico area in 1863.

event.title: was begun in the spring of 1894

data.event: Mining in the Curry Mining District was begun in the spring of 1894.
Due to harassment by Crow Indians, Yellowstone City was abandoned by 1865.
The St. Julian Mine was opened in 1887.

event.title: was built in the late 1890s and a 12 stamp mill in 1904

data.event: A ten stamp mill was built in the late 1890s and a 12 stamp mill in 1904.
